languages.text: {n}Проктор убивает девушку быстрее, чем до нее успевает дойти смысл ваших слов. Как сломанная кукла, она оседает на пол, Соломон же, не задержавшись на ней и взглядом, отворачивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Щелчок затвора. Выстрел. Лидзи удивленно смотрит на ладони — как капает, заполняя их, густая бордовая кровь. И тихо падает на пол.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Proctor swiftly kills the young woman before she is able to comprehend what you said. She sinks to the floor like a broken doll. Solomorne looks away, not resting his gaze on her even for a moment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Проктор убивает девушку быстрее, чем до нее успевает дойти смысл ваших слов. Как сломанная кукла, она оседает на пол, Соломон же, не задержавшись на ней и взглядом, отворачивается.{/n}

{n}The Proctor swiftly kills the young woman before she is able to comprehend what you said. She sinks to the floor like a broken doll. Solomorne looks away, not resting his gaze on her even for a moment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}可怜的姑娘还没能理解你的话是什么意思，索罗蒙就已经迅速处决了她。她倒在地上，仿佛坏掉的洋娃娃一样。索罗蒙移开了视线，目光一刻都没有在她身上停留。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor swiftly kills the young woman before she is able to comprehend what you said. She sinks to the floor like a broken doll. Solomorne looks away, not resting his gaze on her even for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}可怜的姑娘还没能理解你的话是什么意思，索罗蒙就已经迅速处决了她。她倒在地上，仿佛坏掉的洋娃娃一样。索罗蒙移开了视线，目光一刻都没有在她身上停留。{/n}

languages.text: {n}代理人は、若い女性があなたの言ったことを理解する間もなく、彼女を迅速に殺す。彼女は壊れた人形のように床に倒れる。ソロモーンは、少しも彼女に視線を留めることなく、視線を移す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor swiftly kills the young woman before she is able to comprehend what you said. She sinks to the floor like a broken doll. Solomorne looks away, not resting his gaze on her even for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}代理人は、若い女性があなたの言ったことを理解する間もなく、彼女を迅速に殺す。彼女は壊れた人形のように床に倒れる。ソロモーンは、少しも彼女に視線を留めることなく、視線を移す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Procurador mata rápidamente a la muchacha antes de que tenga ocasión de entender tus palabras. Su cuerpo sin vida se desploma como una muñeca desmadejada. Solomorne aparta la mirada, sin dignarse a posarla sobre ella ni por un momento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor swiftly kills the young woman before she is able to comprehend what you said. She sinks to the floor like a broken doll. Solomorne looks away, not resting his gaze on her even for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Procurador mata rápidamente a la muchacha antes de que tenga ocasión de entender tus palabras. Su cuerpo sin vida se desploma como una muñeca desmadejada. Solomorne aparta la mirada, sin dignarse a posarla sobre ella ni por un momento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Üsteğmen, o daha ne dediğini kavrayamadan genç kadını hızla öldürüyor. Maive, kırık bir oyuncak bebek misali yere yığılıyor. Başka tarafa bakan Solomorne, bir an olsun bakışlarını kadına çevirmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor swiftly kills the young woman before she is able to comprehend what you said. She sinks to the floor like a broken doll. Solomorne looks away, not resting his gaze on her even for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Üsteğmen, o daha ne dediğini kavrayamadan genç kadını hızla öldürüyor. Maive, kırık bir oyuncak bebek misali yere yığılıyor. Başka tarafa bakan Solomorne, bir an olsun bakışlarını kadına çevirmiyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le proctor tue rapidement la jeune femme avant qu'elle ne puisse comprendre vos paroles. Son corps s'effondre au sol comme une poupée de chiffon, et Solomorne détourne la tête sans lui accorder le moindre regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor swiftly kills the young woman before she is able to comprehend what you said. She sinks to the floor like a broken doll. Solomorne looks away, not resting his gaze on her even for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le proctor tue rapidement la jeune femme avant qu'elle ne puisse comprendre vos paroles. Son corps s'effondre au sol comme une poupée de chiffon, et Solomorne détourne la tête sans lui accorder le moindre regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Proktor tötet die junge Frau so schnell, dass sie nicht einmal mehr begreift, was du gesagt hast. Sie sinkt zu Boden wie eine kaputte Puppe. Solomorne wendet den Blick ab und sieht sie keinen Augenblick mehr an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor swiftly kills the young woman before she is able to comprehend what you said. She sinks to the floor like a broken doll. Solomorne looks away, not resting his gaze on her even for a moment.{/n}
